name: storyden
description: Storyden is a self-hosted community platform that combines forums, blogs, and rich content feeds with modern UX, aiming to replace traditional forums.
features: Forum discussions: Creates threaded discussions with modern UX.
Blog platform: Publishes long-form content with rich formatting.
Content feeds: Aggregates posts and discussions in unified feed.
User profiles: Displays user activity, posts, and contributions.
Rich media: Embeds images, videos, and other media in posts.
Markdown support: Writes content with Markdown formatting.
Moderation tools: Manages content with admin and moderator controls.
Notification system: Alerts users on replies, mentions, and activity.
Search functionality: Finds content across forums and blogs.
Tag system: Organizes content with tags and categories.
Mobile responsive: Participates in community from any device.
API access: Integrates with external tools via REST API.
